```{r load_packages, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle", fill = "#e4e4e4", height = "15px"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px"))


wk_post <- tibble(
  
"eCampus" = c(unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked),

"Slack" = c(checked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked),

Description = c("Read some papers on mixed methods",
                "Construct a couple of posts",
                "Go through the shorter slideshow on evaluation models",
                "Go through the longer slideshow on data collection",
                "Take a look at some *extra* materials on evaluation checklists"
                ),


Location = c("[Link](/readings/11-readings/#read-papers)",
             "[Link](/readings/11-readings/#postslidex)",
             "[Link](/lesson/11-lesson/#evaluation-models)",
             "[Link](/lesson/11-lesson/#data-collection)",
             "[Link](/example/09-example/#evaluation-checklists)"
             
    )

)
```

### What's Due?

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'cclc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "20em") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "10em") %>% 
  row_spec(0, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  row_spec(1, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;')
```
